title: Medarot (Medabots)
synopsis: Medabots—powerful robots granted artificial intelligence through special "medals"—serve at the whims of their owner. They are more commonly used in "Robbatling," a popular combat sport where two medabots face off against one another. In its professional form, Medafighters use their Medabots to qualify for the World Tournament and fight amongst the elite to gain the title of champion.
voices: ['Takeuchi, Junko', 'Yamazaki, Michiru', 'Sendai, Eri', 'Shimizu, Hiroshi', 'Naitou, Ryou', 'Suzuki, Masami', 'Tsuruoka, Satoshi', 'Yamazaki, Shigenori', 'Ishibashi, Mika']
